## Muriyi nyigisho uzokwiga:  
• Ingene ubunyegezabanga bumenywa.  
• Ingene ukomeza akanyegezabanga.  
• Ubunyegezabanga bungahe warukwiriye gukoresha.

Akanyegezabanga kawe kenshi niko kambere kandi gakomeye gusumba muguhumuriza umutekano wibikuranga. Nico kimwe nk'urugi rw'inzu yaho uba. Gukoresha akanyegezabanga atarikeza canke kutagakoresha nagato bisa nokureka urugi rwuguruye ijoro ryose. Bishoboka kwatanumwe azonkwinjira canke ko bazokwiba ibintu vyawe vyose. Itondere rero cane kukungene utangura akanyegezabanga hamwe naho ububika.

![Ni gute ubunyegezabanga bumenywa](2.png)  
### Ni gute ubunyegezabanga bumenywa?  
Ni gute ubunyegezabanga bwononekara? Inzego zishobora kukwihweza ziri kure wandika akanyegezabanga. Bashobora no gushiramwo programme yiba nka spyware imenya ivyo wanditse vyose muri ordinateur kandi igaca ibirungika kuwuriko arabiraba. Raba abagukikuje ubitondeye kandi wongere ugume ushira kugihe (mettre à jour) anti-spyware na anti-virus.

### Ni gute nogira akanyegezabanga gakomeya?  
Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gutegura ubunyegezabanga bugoye gutora kandi bworoshe kwibuka. Ubuzwi cane ni mnémotechnique ( uburyo canke ukuntu ushoboza gusumba kwibuka, nka rime canke acronyme). Reka dufatire kuryungane rimenyerewe:  
Kubaho canke kutabaho (To be or not to be?)? Ico ni co kibazo. (Hamlet, Shakespeare)  
Dushobora kubihindura muri: 2Bon2B?TItQ  
Mukarorero gaheruka, twasubirije amajambo nibishushane vyayo mumvungo vy'ibitigiri hamwe n'acronyme, n'amazina, n'amavuga (verbe) yanditswe nindome nini hamwe nayandi mamajambo yanditse nindome ntoto.  
Canke, nk'akarorero: Naraye ndose aho abantu bose bavuka bangana (I had a dream, where all men were born equal) (Martin Luther King)  
Dushobora kubihindura muri: 1haDwaMwB=

ibindi vyogufasha birimwo nko gusubiriza ibitigiri nivyo bishushanye mu ndome, gucagagura amajambo asa n'ibitigiri hamwe nogukoresha utuntu twerekana ingene wiyumvamwo (émoticônes).  
I,i,l,t =1 o,O=0 s,S=5,2 four,for,fore=4 two,to,too=2  
For instance: Are you happy today?  
We can convert this to: rU:-)2d?

![akarorero kava kuri xkcd 636](3.png)  
Ushobora gusanga bigoye kwibuka ubu buryo. Ababizi bamwe bavuga ngo ubu bunyegezabanga ntibuhumurije nkaho wokoresheje uburyo busanzwe. Udashoboye kwibuka akanyegezabanga  kawe, ntibigukingira hamwe n'abaguhaye inkuru. Nyamba wasanze uburyo buheruka bugoye cane, gerageza gutora muruvange amajambo ashika nkane; maremare nivyiza gusumba.  
Ubu nuburorero busanzwe kandi urashobora gutangura uburyo bwawe bwokunyegeza ibitigiri n'amajambo. Biranahanuwe yuko wobigira uko.
# Menya: Tubasavye kudakoresha uburorero bwerekanywe hejuru nk'akanyegezabanga kawe!

## Nkeneye ubunyegezabanga bungahe?  
Ntwisunze icigwa gishasha, uwukoresha internet hagati na hagati afise amakonti 25 akingiwe n'ubunyegezabanga ariko agakoresha ibice 6.5 gusa muri yose. Muntumbero yogukoresha ubunyegezabanga bwawe neza, ukeneye kugira urutonde kumutekano wawe. StoryMaker ihanura yuko wokoresha ubwoko 3 bw'ubunyegezabanga bifatiwe kubintu bizwi wifuza.

![Akarorero k'akanyegezabanga utitwararitse (mot de passe)](4.png)  
## Ubunyegezabanga utitwararitse  
Kuri site iyariyo yose ukeneye akanyegezabanga kugira wiyandikishe, nkamasite atanga inkuru, koresha akanyegezabanga utitwararitse. Fatanya akanyegezabanga utitwararitse kawe na email utitwararitse yawe kugira wincungere gusumba. Ntuze wigere ukoresha akanyegezabanga kw'ikonti isaba gutanga ibikuranga. Akakanyegezabanga ntigakwiriye gushushana n'akanyegezabanga kawe gakomeye kokwingira kumutekano.

## Ubunyegezabanga bukingiwe  
Kuri site iyariyo yose isaba ibikuranga, koresha akanyegezabanga gakingiwe.Aka kanyegezabanga gakwiriye kuba gakwijije ibisabwa kurugezo (normes) rwerekeye ubunyegezabanga bukomeye bwavuzwe hejuru. Bika ikopi y'akanyegezabanga bihumurije, cane cane nyamba iyo konti isaba ibikuranga, nk'inimero z'ikarata ya credit, canke icuditse nikonti yawe yama média sociaux, nka facebook canke twitter. Ushobora gusangira bumwe muri ubu bunyegezabanga nabantu bazwi nk'umuryango n'abomukorana mugihe utishoboje gushikira ikonti yawe kandi ukeneye kurungika information zishobora gusuzumwa canke kugara ikonti giturumbuka.

![Akarorero  kakanyegezabanga kadashizwe ahabona (confidentiel) ](5.png)  
## Ubunyegezabanga budashizwe ahabona  
Akanyegezabanga kadashizwe ahabona gakwiye kumenywa nawe wenyene. Akanyegezabanga gakwiriye gukoreshwa kuri email yi konti yawe nkuru. Email yariyo yose icuditse namakonti yama  médias sociaux canke ishobora kugara canke guhindura ayandi makonti ibwirizwa kugira akanyegezabanga kadashizwe ahabona (confidentiel). Nyamba ukingiye akanyegezabanga kamwe, kabwirizwa kuba aka. Ikonti ya email yawe nkuru niyo ifise akamaro kanini kumutekano wawe hamwe nuwabaguha inkuru nabo mukorana.  
Kandi ugume ufise akanyegezabanga kadashizwe ahabona mugukingira iterefone yawe. Ntukoreshe PIN, canke ngo unyereze, canke igikumu, canke akanyegezabanga kugururwa nukumenya mumaso. Akanyegezabanga karekare wiyandikiye niko konyene kabwirizwa gukoreshwa kuri terefone yawe.

##IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
• bika ahantu hahumurije ikopi y'akanyegezabanga kose wanditse  
• Koresha ubunyegezabanga butandukanye ku makonti atandukanye  
• Koresha indome canke ibitigiri bitari munsi ya 10 mu gutangura akanyegezabanga  
• Bisumbije indome canke ibitigiri biharuye, gerageza amajambo adasanzwe atari munsi yane  
• Koresha ibintu bitandukanye bitari indome n'ibitigiri gusa  
• Ntushiremwo ibikwerekeye bisanzwe bizwi  
• Ntusangire akanyegezabanga kawe  
• Hindura akanyegezabanga kawe kumezi 3 canke 6  
• Umenye neza kowashoboye kurungika akanyegezabanga kawe mumutekano
